Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
Moderately restores HP based on HP damage dealt
Recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP
Self: 3 turns Angelo Recover
Cancels special effect Angel Wing
While Angelo Recover active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angelo)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angelo)

completeListOfAbilities.name: Angel Wing
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Instant turn rate
Self: 3 turns special effect Angel Wing
Cancels Angelo Recover
Does not add to turn count; does consume count during summoning、 support
While special effect Angel Wing active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 largely raises ATK
 • Largely lowers DEF

completeListOfAbilities.name: HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)

3-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack
Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
Slightly consumes HP upon use

completeListOfAbilities.name: Angel Wing Meteor
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
3-hit group magic BRV attack + group HP attack delivered 3 times
BRV attacks distributed based on number of enemies
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Self: 3 turns special effect Angel Wing
Cancels Angelo Recover
While special effect Angel Wing active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)
 • Moderately raises MAX BRV、 largely raises ATK
 • Largely lowers DEF

passives.name: Mighty Angelo Cannon
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Angelo Cannon
passives.short_desc: Mighty Angelo Cannon: Increases BRV damage dealt with Angelo Cannon

passives.name: Chain Bonus
passives.desc: Deals slightly more BRV damage when using chain attacks
passives.short_desc: Chain Bonus: Increases BRV damage dealt

passives.name: Greater Rejuvenate
passives.desc: Slightly recovers more HP with heals
passives.short_desc: Greater Rejuvenate: Raises HP recovery amount

passives.name: Angel Wing Attack Up
passives.desc: After using Angel Wing:\n • Slightly raises ATK for 1 turn
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Attack Up: Raises ATK

passives.name: Mighty Critical Hit
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with critical hits
passives.short_desc: Mighty Critical Hit: Increases BRV damage dealt with Critical Hit

passives.name: Charged Angelo Cannon
passives.desc: Angelo Cannon use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Angelo Cannon: Raises use count of Angelo Cannon

passives.name: She Who Won't Bend to Fate
passives.desc: HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV\nLimit: 150% of INT BRV
passives.short_desc: She Who Won't Bend to Fate: Adds excess HP recovered to BRV

passives.name: Charged Angel Wing
passives.desc: Angel Wing use +1
passives.short_desc: Charged Angel Wing: Raises use count of Angel Wing

passives.name: Leader of the Forest Owls
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with BRV Attack+ (Angelo)、 BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)、 HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)
passives.short_desc: Leader of the Forest Owls: Increases BRV damage dealt with BRV Attack+ (Angelo)、 BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing)、 HP Attack+ (Angel Wing)

passives.name: All Buffed Attack Boost
passives.desc: Slightly raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK with active buffs
passives.short_desc: All Buffed Attack Boost: Raises party's MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Angelo Cannon Extension
passives.desc:
Angelo Cannon use +2

When using Angelo Cannon:
 • BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 • Moderately restores own HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 20% of own MAX HP

When using BRV Attack+ (Angelo):
 • Slight BRV damage boost

When using HP Attack+ (Angelo):
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Angelo Cannon Extension: Boost to Angelo Cannon

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 SPD with active buffs
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Angel Wing Extension
passives.desc:
When using Angel Wing:
 • Increases BRV based on INT BRV

When using BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing):
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost

When using HP Attack+ (Angel Wing):
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Extension: Boost to Angel Wing

passive.name: Initial Attack Growth
passive.desc: Initial Attack use +1\n\nInitial Attack effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Initial Attack Growth: Boost to Initial Attack

passive.name: With a Loyal Companion
passive.desc:
When using Angelo Cannon:
 • BRV damage boost
 • Angelo Recover boost、 duration+

When using BRV Attack+ (Angelo):
 • Boost to BRV granted based on ATK

When using HP Attack+ (Angelo):
 • Boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV
passive.short_desc: With a Loyal Companion: Boost to Angelo Cannon

passive.name: Beautiful Wings
passive.desc:
When using Angel Wing:
 • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up I、 ATK Up I
 • BRV Attack+ (Angel Wing) BRV damage boost
 
When using HP Attack+ (Angel Wing):
 • BRV damage boost
 • Deals 50% HP damage to non-targets
passive.short_desc: Beautiful Wings: Boost to Angel Wing

passive.name: Sorceress's Successor
passive.desc: May equip EX ability Angel Wing Meteor
passive.short_desc: Sorceress's Successor: May equip Angel Wing Meteor

passives.name: Mighty Angel Wing Meteor
passives.desc: Slightly increases BRV damage dealt with Angel Wing Meteor
passives.short_desc: Mighty Angel Wing Meteor: Increases BRV damage dealt with Angel Wing Meteor

passives.name: Angel Wing Meteor Buff Plus
passives.desc: When using Angel Wing Meteor:\n • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II、 ATK Up II
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Meteor Buff Plus: Grants MAX BRV Up、 ATK Up when using Angel Wing Meteor

passives.name: Angel Wing Meteor Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Angel Wing Meteor
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Meteor Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Angel Wing Meteor

passive.name: Sorceress's Successor Extension
passive.desc: Boost to EX ability Angel Wing Meteor
passive.short_desc: Sorceress's Successor Extension: Boost to Angel Wing Meteor

passives.name: Angel Wing Meteor Force Advance Angelo Plus
passives.desc:
When using Angel Wing Meteor、 Angel Wing Meteor (Angelo):
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

While Angelo Recover active:
 • Angel Wing Meteor becomes Angel Wing Meteor (Angelo) (self: 8 turns Seething Power)
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Meteor Force Advance Angelo Plus: Boost to Angel Wing Meteor

passives.name: Sorceress's Successor Extension Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Rising Sun (VIII)+ or passive ability Sorceress's Successor Extension:\n • Slightly raises MAX BRV、 largely raises ATK
passives.short_desc: Sorceress's Successor Extension Attack Boost Up: Raises MAX BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Angel Wing Meteor Buff Starting
passives.desc: At start of quest:\n • Self: 8 turns MAX BRV Up II、 ATK Up II
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Meteor Buff Starting: MAX BRV Up II、 ATK Up II at start of quest

passives.name: Angel Wing Meteor BRV Up Force Advance Recast MAX
passives.desc:
When using Angel Wing Meteor、 Angel Wing Meteor (Angelo):
 • Tremendous BRV damage boost
 • Slightly raises limit of BRV that may be stolen in excess of MAX BRV
 • Increases BRV by 30% of cumulative HP damage dealt after each HP attack (excluding last HP attack)

At start of quest:
 • Full recast gauge
passives.short_desc: Angel Wing Meteor BRV Up Force Advance Recast MAX: Boost to Angel Wing Meteor; full recast gauge at start of quest
